scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:shared && npm run build:ui && npm run build:api-client && npm run build:config
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:packages: npm run test:shared && npm run test:ui && npm run test:api-client && npm run test:config
scripts.test:apps: npm run test:api && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:packages && npm run lint:apps
scripts.lint:packages: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:ui && npm run lint:api-client && npm run lint:config
scripts.lint:apps: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:packages && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:packages: npm run install:shared && npm run install:ui && npm run install:api-client && npm run install:config
scripts.install:apps: npm run install:api && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:apps

scripts.clean:apps: npm run clean:api && npm run clean:web && npm run clean:mobile
